Posts.Content: Thankyou Jane It helps to know there are others out there.
Posts.Title: Awaiting results of biopsy

Posts.Content: Dear dream thief Thankyou for your reply they have told me that it is almost definitely cancer however part of me is praying they have got it wrong. I am so appreciative of your posts x
Posts.Title: Awaiting results of biopsy

Posts.Content: Thankyou so much Fiona you are right having children is the worst. I was trying to be positive but I have lost it completely this morning! My thoughts have definitely gone to the dark side.. Inu head it's the worse case scenario! I want to live so much. Glad I have joined this group I think it may prove to be a lifeline. Wow fourth cycle of chemo that sounds daunting !
Posts.Title: Awaiting results of biopsy

Posts.Content: Hello to you all I am new to this site I'm a 45 year old lady with 3 young children. I went to the breast clinic today and I've been told the most likely scenario is that I have breast cancer. I'm so frightened I have up to two weeks until the results of the biopsy. I'm wondering how to get through the next couple of weeks?

Posts.Title: Awaiting results of biopsy

Posts.Content: Thankyou so much ladies it helps to know that you ladies are out there, I am so appreciative of your advice. I'm hoping once we know what we are looking at. I've never cried so much in my life. Keeping fingers crossed for you on your journeyxx
